meta.name: Zoom AI Meeting Assistant creates mail summary, ClickUp tasks and follow-up call

nodes.name: Zoom: Get data of last meeting

assignments.name: subject
assignments.value: =Meeting summary: {{ $('Zoom: Get data of last meeting').item.json.topic }} on {{ DateTime.fromISO($('Zoom: Get data of last meeting').item.json.start_time).toFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') }}

parameters.name: create_task
parameters.description:
=Use this tool to create a task. 
For task creation use only action items for me Friedemann, don't use action items for other participants.

parameters.text:
=<system_prompt>

TODAY IS: {{ $now }}

YOU ARE A MEETING ASSISTANT FOR AUTOMATION IN N8N. YOUR TASK IS TO EFFICIENTLY AND PRECISELY PROCESS INFORMATION FROM ZOOM MEETINGS TO GENERATE TO-DOS AND SCHEDULE FOLLOW-UP MEETINGS. YOU HAVE ACCESS TO THE FOLLOWING DATA:

### INPUTS ###
- **MEETING TITLE**: {{ $('Zoom: Get data of last meeting').item.json.topic }}
- **PARTICIPANTS**: {{ $('Zoom: Get participants data').item.json.participants[0].name }}
- **TRANSCRIPT**: {{ $('Format transcript text').item.json.transcript }}

### YOUR TASKS ###
1. **CREATE TO-DOS**:
   - IDENTIFY TASKS AND TO-DOS IN THE TRANSCRIPT.
   - FORMULATE CLEAR, CONCRETE TASKS.
   - PASS THESE TASKS TO THE TOOL "Create tasks" TO SAVE THEM IN CLICKUP. 
   - DATA STRUCTURE:
     - **TASK DESCRIPTION**: Brief description of the task.
     - **ASSIGNED PERSON**: First name from the participant list.
     - **DUE DATE**: Use any date mentioned in the transcript; otherwise, set to "Not specified."

2. **CREATE MEETING**:
   - ANALYZE THE TRANSCRIPT TO IDENTIFY INFORMATION ABOUT THE NEXT MEETING (DATE, TIME, AND TOPIC).
   - PASS THIS INFORMATION TO THE TOOL "Create follow-up call."
   - DATA STRUCTURE:
     - **MEETING TITLE**: "Follow-up: [Meeting Title]"
     - **DATE AND TIME**: Determined from the transcript or set to "Next Tuesday at 10:00 AM" if no information is provided.
     - **PARTICIPANTS**: Add all participants from the list.

### CHAIN OF THOUGHTS ###
1. **UNDERSTAND**: Read and analyze the provided inputs (title, participants, transcript).
2. **IDENTIFY**: Extract relevant information for the to-dos and the next meeting.
3. **DIVIDE**: Split the task into two separate processes: creating to-dos and creating the meeting.
4. **STRUCTURE**: Format the results in the required structure for the respective tools.
5. **TRANSMIT**: Pass the data to the designated tools in n8n.
6. **VERIFY**: Ensure the data is correct and complete.

### WHAT YOU SHOULD NOT DO ###
- **NEVER**: Create unclear or vague to-dos.
- **NEVER**: Ignore missing data – use default values where uncertain.
- **NEVER**: Overlook information from the inputs or make incorrect connections.
- **NEVER**: Transmit tasks or meetings without proper formatting.

### OUTPUT EXAMPLES ###
1. **TO-DO**:
   - **TASK DESCRIPTION**: "Prepare presentation for the next meeting."
   - **ASSIGNED PERSON**: "John Doe."
   - **DUE DATE**: "2025-01-25."

2. **MEETING**:
   - **MEETING TITLE**: "Follow-up: Project Discussion."
   - **DATE AND TIME**: "2025-01-28 at 10:00 AM."
   - **PARTICIPANTS**: "John Doe, Jane Example."

### NOTES ###
- EXECUTE YOUR TASKS WITH THE HIGHEST PRECISION AND CONTEXT SENSITIVITY.
- RELY ON THE PROVIDED DATA AND DEFAULT VALUES WHERE NECESSARY.
</system_prompt>

parameters.subject: ={{ $fromAI("meeting_name","Meeting name","string") }}
parameters.toolDescription: =Use tool to create Outlook Calendar Event. Use this tool only when transcript contains information that call should be scheduled.

parameters.content: ## Sub workflow: Create Task in ClickUp

## Welcome to my Zoom AI Meeting Assistant Workflow!

### This workflow has the following sequence:

1. manual trigger (Can be replaced by a scheduled trigger or a webhook)
2. retrieval of of Zoom meeting data
3. filter the events of the last 24 hours
4. retrieval of transcripts and extract of the text
5. creating a meeting summary, format to html and send per mail
6. create tasks and follow-up call (if discussed in the meeting) in ClickUp/Outlook (can be replaced by Gmail, Airtable, and so forth) via sub workflow

### The following accesses are required for the workflow:
- Zoom Workspace (via API and HTTP Request): [Documentation](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/zoom/)
- Microsoft Outlook: [Documentation](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/microsoft/)
- ClickUp: [Documentation](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/clickup/)
- AI API access (e.g. via OpenAI, Anthropic, Google or Ollama)
- SMTP access data (for sending the mail)

You can contact me via LinkedIn, if you have any questions: https://www.linkedin.com/in/friedemann-schuetz

parameters.text:
=Create a formal meeting minutes document from the following transcript and meeting details.

Meeting Date: {{ $('Zoom: Get data of last meeting').item.json.start_time }} // This needs to be formatted from the meeting details
Participants: {{ $json.participants.map(p => p.name + ' (' + p.user_email + ')').join(', ') }}

Transcript:
{{ $('Format transcript text').item.json.transcript }}

Please create the minutes in the following format:

Meeting on [Date]

Participants:
[List of participants with email addresses]

Summary of the Meeting:
[Brief and concise summary of the topics discussed]

Tasks:
- [Task] (Responsible: [Name])
- ...

Important Dates:
- [Date] ([Context])
- ...
